articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner back in U.S. following high-profile Russia jailing, prisoner swap - CBC News
articles.description: Brittney Griner disembarked from a plane in Texas early Friday, nearly 10 months after the basketball star was detained in Russia and became the most high-profile American jailed abroad.
articles.content:
